examples:
What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: My design isn’t saving properly. One of the text boxes moves positions after I save it.

What kind of problem?: Downloading

Describe your issue: when i save the document the components (lines/text/boxes etc) of saved version does not line  up with the online version.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: There is a red box around some of my text with my initials / and that particular design won’t save ?!?!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Basic functions during editing won't work. For example, can't move a text box around, like it is frozen? also saving issues.

What kind of problem?: Saving

Describe your issue: When ever I have a text box, it comes out cluttered and distorted on my phone when I design things on my computer. It makes it go to the next line and it makes the text box smaller on my phone than what I put it on my PC.
What type of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: how can I rescue a box on page 4,

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Currently working on a recipe project and all is well for like ten minutes then it will not allow me to move any text or boxes so I go to refresh the browser and its fine. but I am having to do this every ten minutes. HELP
What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: When wanting a text box, I cannot, I cannot enlarge or center.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Why is the Pinterest "save" button on top of the box to select a file? I am trying to move designs into folders and the Pinterest button is in the way of the selection box!! Super annoying and frustrating.

What kind of problem?: <NAME>

Beskriv ditt problem: Hi! <NAME> trying to move the different boxes with text, but it doesn´t work. When I open the template I can move the boxes around, but after a while they wont move. I thought it was just some kind of bug som I opened a new template again but the same thing kept happening.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I can not move the boxes in my project

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Text box will not resize or move

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Text box isn't moving when I try to move it around. It was working when I started and now that I am almost done it won't move anymore.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Unable to resize or move the text boxes
What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I can't edit some elements or the text box, I can't move them.

What kind of problem?: Downloading

Describe your issue: When I save as PDF and PNG, some of the text boxes are not in the same place as they are on the website when I am making my design.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Text boxes aren't allowing me to move them or resize them. It seems everything is locked in place even though I do not have it locked.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I'm trying to copy and paste text into a text box on the app, but it's not giving me that option.
What type of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: I try to modify the document, move texts within the box and they do not work for me. I can only erase
What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: I want to move a site text box and it won't let me.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello sir I am haiving problem in using canva . Editing is not working properly . I cant even type on text box. I cant use my right thum to resize the box and I need to do it from left thumb .

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Embed code for Canva presentation does not work on my website. Empty box with / shows.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hello, I've been using Canva for these past 2 years, and I found some "bug" when I use Canva in MacOS. When I use element such as "frame" or "grid" with picture in it, the picture is always out of the box (not in the real size), it's bother me because I need to export it first to see the actual size, to see the actual design I already did. 

And there's is a "bug" too when I use a text box. So many times, I design for an article in Canva, and when I save it, the text box is not like when I design. 

I think that's 2 main problems that bother me so much when I use Canva in my <NAME>. I really hope that Canva team can fix it. Thank you for your amazing services! I love Canva so much!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Grouping text with a box element doesn't work at all.

Resizing the box element is difficult when text is positioned on it, it rather selects the text for resizing. Annoying.

Describe your issue: lock on some boxes - can you delete them? 

What kind of problem?: Saving

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I suddenly cannot move text boxes, photos or anything around. Please help, if I start a new project, it would be fine, but I'm on the verge of finishing :<(
What kind of problem? : Other description of your problem: The text box cannot be moved while editing

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: i cant resize an text box

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I designed a presentation and have been editing it.  Now, I can't resize text boxes, manipulate size of graphics, etc.  Is there something about presentations that won't allow this?  Did I "lock" something accidentally?  Thank you, <NAME>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I can not move my text box after I have already started editing it.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi!  After about five min. of working on a presentation, I lose the ability to move text boxes/image boxes.  Internet is fine - not sure what's going on!  Trying to create a lesson plan for tomorrow on today's inauguration, so this is time sensitive!!
What kind of problem is it ?: Other Describe the problem: I cannot enlarge or move any of the text boxes or elements I cannot move them anywhere
What kind of problem is it ?: Going up Describe the problem: I cannot move the text boxes or selected items
What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: I cannot move the text box

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am unable to move text boxes on the template that was created for me. I just want to adjust them on the page.
What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: I cannot edit the text boxes

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue:  text box not moving to extended or can't be dragged. Text is not locked.

Deadline of presentation slides.
I've logged out and in. It will work for a few mins and then error again. 

See video to show issue

<URL>
What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: It won't let me move anything, text boxes etc.

I try to click inside the text box to add something and the whole image moves together. And when you clicked the cursor where I want to change, the cursor is not where I left it.

Describe your issue: I cannot resize or move text boxes

What kind of problem is it ?: Others Describe the problem: I cannot move the text boxes

Describe your issue: During editing, moving and aligning options stop working after a while. So I can not move my text boxes around.
